title: Z+F Splat Charger
paragraphs: The Z+F Splat Charger is a main weapon in Splatoon 3, introduced in Fresh Season 2023. It is a Z+F-branded variant of the Splat Charger, and an unscoped variant of the Z+F Splatterscope. It was teased in the Fresh Season 2023 poster on 16 February 2023 and was officially revealed on Splatoon's Twitter accounts on 20 February 2023. It was released as part of 3.0.0 on 1 March 2023.
It is a rebranded successor of Firefin Splat Charger from Splatoon 2 following the merger between Firefin and Zekko to form Z+F.
- The Z+F Splat Charger shown in the Fresh Season 2023 promotional poster
- The Inkling on the right wields the Z+F Splat Charger
- The Tableturf Battle card icon of the Z+F Splat Charger.
